title: Ep. - 245 - EXECUTIVE PRODUCERS OF ATLANTA’S MISSING AND MURDERED: THE LOST CHILDREN
description:
Maro Chermayeff and Sam Pollard are Executive Producers of Atlanta's Missing And Murdered: The Lost Children, a five-part HBO documentary series offering an unprecedented look at the abduction and murder of at least 30 African-American children and young adults in Atlanta between 1979 and 1981. Forty years later, with the official re-opening of the case by Atlanta Mayor Keisha Lance Bottoms, the series tells the inside story of this shocking tragedy, shedding new light on the horrific killings through exclusive archival material as well as interviews with those closest to the children and investigation.

 

Lyrsa Torres was a contestant on Survivor: David vs. Goliath. She reviews this season of Real Housewives of New York, and decides which castmates of RHONY would get kicked off Survivor, and which one could win.

 

 

Reality Life with Kate Casey

Patreon: http://www.patreon.com/katecasey

Cameo: https://www.cameo.com/katecasey

Twitter: @katecasey

Instagram: @katecaseyca

Facebook Group: https://www.facebook.com/groups/113157919338245/

Facebook.com/loveandknuckles

Amazon List: http://www.amazon.com/shop/katecaseyca

 

See acast.com/privacy for privacy and opt-out information.
